content.detailedDescription:
2 hours before air port opens, seen light in the sky hanging and hovering ran to grab the camera to get angle video since i have problems with my camera being cheap / not a good ufology camera.  no zoom/focus on the camera while taking video.

it was a bright flood light at first, and hovering a path slowly silently.  it had several red strobe lights, at least 5 red strobe lights, white marker lights and also white flood lights projecting auroras of white.

i want to say there were also a green lights on it but im not positive, the white maker lights red strobes and white flood lights really say what this was.  dark out, 5 am so shapes hard to decipher definitively.

watching the video in vlc in full screen shows the flood light going out and strobe only then flood light back on.


ive build linux from scratch, solve rubiks cubes, my parents a navy vet.

i woke up this morning choking on rice @ 2:30ish am flying out of bed  event was @ 5:55 6 am gerald r ford airport path but 2 hours before any scheduled flights inbound, and outbound flights start @ around an hour before that.

unadulterated kodak ez share zd710 video.
content.summary: Slowly hanged in sky hovering flood light air port path 2 hours before port open

content.detailedDescription:
At about 2:00 am on friday morning november 4 2011 i went outside for a cigarette and was looking up at the stars as i always do. the sky was clear and the stars were out. i saw 3 lights in a triangular shape move quickly across the sky from sse to nnw. the lights were dim and there was no noise. the lights were solid and not blinking, they were white in color and just before it went out of view they switched positions. they could have been 1 craft rotating or 3 different craft switching positions. but the impression i got was that it was one craft with 3 lights. i watched the skies for a bit longer then went inside to text about it. i then went back outside about 15 minutes later and at about 2:20 am saw about 7-8 dim white lights in a line, each light slightly staggered from the previous one. this object moved as one object, it was likely a cigar shaped craft and it moved from north to south. it appeared to be higher in the sky than the first one i saw. 

i am a graduate student at texas a&m and live in bryan just over the college station border.
content.summary: Multiple sightings in one night

content.detailedDescription: Saw two glowing orbs- like energy balls- out in the night sky when i took dog outside. they were definitely not planes or helicopters. they were bright and moving around. the one over my neighbors house across the street was much lower than the one all the way to the left. they were in the air for about an hour and a half. no noise. the glowing orb seemed to have different colors coming off it - could be changing lights. we live near an army air field so maybe this is some experiment. they were directly east probably over the ocean. both my mom and i witnessed them. they seemed to be staying in the same area - no huge moves or anything. my reaction was one of excitement and fear. i've been reading a lot about ufo's lately because i've seen these balls out here on the island before. luckily, i was able to grab my video cam this time. i immediately went on youtube and saw there were orbs like the ones i saw on other people's ufo videos. what is going on? government experiment or is it aircraft? i never lost sight of the objects. i just closed the door and went to bed so i can't say how long they stayed out there. i viewed them for about 1.30 hrs.
content.summary: 2 glowing orbs changing different colors

content.detailedDescription: I had just sat down at about 8:50 pm cdt in my south st. louis city backyard on saturday 10/29, facing west, when i noticed a lower altitude light in the sky slowly crossing left to right in front of me, very slightly gaining altitude. it was distinctive in appearance, like a 4th of july roman candle, yellow-orange-white in color. there appeared to be a smaller white light with it, as if it could be another light on a craft. it was not distinctive in size, about the size of lower elevation plane approaching the st. louis airport 6 miles away. the craft was yet slightly increasing in altitude. there were no blinking lights, and no discernible sound. i watched it for a few seconds after i'd noticed it and thought it was bright enough and moving slowly enough that i could run in my house, get my camera and take a picture of it. i've never seen a craft with lights like that before and i'm 51, but again, it was more anomalous than surreal. stepping back outside several seconds later, i got the object in the viewfinder and zoomed in the full 24x optical resolution. i clearly saw a fuzzy circular object, but not with the extending "rays" i was seeing with my eyes. when i pressed the auto-focus, immediately i could no longer see the object in the frame, nor did i see the object move out of the frame. i looked with my eye and noticed the object had significantly dimmed down. the object was not dimming while i could see it with my eyes. the object apparently dimmed down to the point the camera could not pick it up exactly at the time i depressed the auto-focus! i continued to look at the object with my eyes after i tried to take its picture, where i finally did actually see it dim out, quickly, though still rising in altitude - which a chinese lantern wouldn't do. july 4th of 2009 and 2010 i and others did see "chinese lanterns" pass by the house, but this object looked more like a steady burning roman candle with a small white light right beside it. the included "picture" is a "photoshop" hybrid image of a picture taken at night of my perspective from the event night, with software overlayed anomalous light(s). i would testify that the image is over 90 percent accurate of what i saw with my eyes before i got my camera that night.
content.summary: Small

content.detailedDescription: I often notice the persistent plane vapor trail phenomenon happening since around '99 over st. louis. some call them "chemtrails," and i sometimes take pictures of the trails and/or planes making them. by the way, i've noticed that not all planes flying at these altitudes leave persistent trails when flying through the same air space close to or through the persistent trails. anyways, in the picture taken saturday 10/22 @16:54 (4:54 pm cdt) i noticed black dots in the image once i'd downloaded it to my computer, especially noticing a triangle of dots in the bottom-left quadrant of the x-trail i was photographing. i think this picture was taken at the full optical zoom of 24x. i expanded the 5.3 megapixal image and only increased the contrast to find the black objects circled in the image, which is a scaled down image of the original. i've taken many pictures of these trails over the years and have never noticed these circular dark objects. they are not camera anomalies as proven by the two pictures submitted, where the dark objects change position between the two images, evidence contrary to a camera anomaly. the second (contrast only adjusted) picture taken @16:55 (4:55 pm cdt), was zoomed back a bit to include my next door neighbor's house for perspective of the x-trail, also showing the circled black objects have moved. there are 9 circled objects in the first picture, 10 in the second. there may be a few more objects in each seen at greater detail but not really at the detail i've published. these objects are not birds which do show up in my "skywriting" pictures sometimes but are pretty easily discerned as such. the objects in these images don't appear to be moving at the time of image capture. these dark objects appear to be something in the sky that has moved in location in the span of 1 minute and 22 seconds. i don't submit this for investigation, but as curiosity to the public of unidentified objects in the sky not conventionally known. i testify that i only altered the original images by; increasing their contrast, overlaying the circles, and scaling them down in size. if you download the images, zoom in with your image viewer to see a bit more detail.
content.summary: Dark circular objects in different positions in two different pictures of x

content.detailedDescription: While driving home i noticed lights above my head so i looked out the drivers window.  at this time, the object was veering left and headed straign east.  it paused and then slowly flew away.  the object had 1 blinking light in the middle back (white) the object had lights running vertically in an yellowish color.  this was way to large for a plane even though we were by a very small airport.  stunned, we slowed down and missed the exit.  the object went behind trees so we turned around. this took less thean 30 seconds and when we arrived to the point of the object, it was gone.  we saw nothing else in the sky besides stars very far away.  we drove east on highway 82 from the 289 intersection but never saw the object again.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Flew over head of truck and turned left. very slow and then paused

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo shoots up into the sky from outside my window at about 5- 5:30 am. computer freezes and no sound after that.

then minutes later hear them talking.

 i moved from swisher, ia to westminster, ca and i was living at my apt. for about two and a half months. i had just turned 22 sept. 20th. one morning i think sept. 25th i could not sleep, and i have been having trouble sleeping a lot. i was lying there staring at my friends computer screen it had a screen saver that was hard to take my eyes off of when i have been awake the whole time my friend was sleeping beside me. then the werid notion that i was not the only one awake and that i have been hearing a faint sound of something for awhile but never really relized it was there and it has been there for awhile, and as soon as this idea came into my head i look towards my window that was on the right of me. my friend had put up blankets to keep the sun out, so i could not see anything. but the very second i mean (very) second i relized and looked towards the window i heard something shoot straight up into the sky and i "can" remember the sound and how fast it took off. it was like it knew when i relized it was there and it just took off. and as soon as it did my eyes also caught the computers screen and it froze the second that this thing took off. ufo was the only explanation i could think of. then i lyed there scared cause i knew that it was out there by me for awhile i never listened close enough to hear the sound. i started questioning why my window, why me? and i couldnt explan so i just lyed there confused and frightened. soon i believe i might have heard some things talking to one another outside my window, i can remember the sounds they were making. i was very freaked out at this point scared that i was going to come face to face with a thing or things. i believe i started to cry and turned and woke up my friend in tears grabbing him and telling him there was something outside and i believe that were, aliens. the minute i woke him up our power went out for about 30 secs to a min. which seemed forever since i was already terrified. he said he believed me but i really dont think he really understood the fact that those events took place and it was very real. i tried to report the sighting but did not go threw with it, the roomates kinda got me to blow it off. i did tell many people about it. i am back in ia and i have met a few people that also believe they have seen or witnessed for themselves ufo's or aliens. i just want to talk to an expert and tell them my story in real details. this really happened i need someone to actually care for once, what i say is true. 
180 description:
content.summary: Something froze my computer and it shot up into the sky made a jet like sound that only i heard did not wake my friend up.

content.detailedDescription: It happened about 33 yrs. ago. we were coming back from visiting family and we went to our parents room to watch t.V. but t.V. was fuzzy . we thought it was the antenna so i looked out the window and what i saw was something very large above the house. it was round and huge it had many lights like squares red and blue. my parents saw it so did my two brothers and niece who were also in the house. when i was able to react i ran outside but i only saw a small red light getting smaller and smaller. we asked the neighbors but no one saw what we did. i called the police and they said no one reported anything like what we saw. the weird thing is that one of my brothers and my niece forgot about the incident a few days later and so did my niece. years later my parents were still living at  the same location and started having experiences with white light in their bedroom. they both told us that in separate ocassions they would wake up in the middle of the night but couldnt move and the room was all white with the light coming from their window. it happened several times to them over several years until they passed away.
content.summary: Bight object above house with lights centrally located area but only my family saw it

content.detailedDescription:
Last night i had my dogs side around 8pm and i have 3 dogs and take all 3 for short walks. when i saw the 2 orbs or very large white lights when i was taking my last dogs for his walk and i was so amazed to what i saw!! they moved from the west to north east they were not together at the time and sort of came together at least closer as they were moving to the east. they did move quite fast with no noise at all.

when i saw the light i had no idea what they were and i was sure that they , 

were not planes or medical choppers which fly over any time of the day.

so walked to the top of the hill in my yard to watch them and the moved very fast and to the east. by the time i go up to see them move east they were almost out of sight and this was only in a few minutes time.
content.summary: 2 white orbs spoted nov. 2 over pa.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside checking oil on my wife's car and it was/is a clear sky
and i looking at the stars and some planes in the sky, and i noticed
a very bright star, but i noticed it was moving, so i kept watching
it and noticed it was moving left and right flying east. there were no
strobe lights or colored marker lights on it. as i was watching it became
dimmer and then disappeared.
content.summary: Bright star like object heading east moving  left to right then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I'm a former nfl football player and have had a couple of things happen where i live. i'm bordered on three sides by the everglades in heron bay tpc. i have footage which i called my wife to tape while i drove home more than a year ago. my college daughter went out mocking my phone call to my back balcony before she changed her mind. the craft flew over my car and i stopped and my other daughter who i was giving a ride home from work started crying and told me to keep driving. we witnessed it from miles away and then encountered it. tongiht there are several weird objects in the sky, not the encounter i had months ago. they are sitting over palm beach airport. my back balcony over looks five airport flight paths. palm beach, boca executive, commercial executive, ftl, and mia, also oppalocka and other small airports. i know what i see!
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 101-500 Feet, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.summary: Flight revolving disk 100ft in diameter and 500ft over head

content.detailedDescription:
It was the fall of 2006. i was a college student at louisiana state university. it was a weekday and one of my roommates, edmond, came to my room and ask me what was the latest i would be willing to drive him to the louis armstrong airport in new orleans. he had just bought a vespa off of ebay from a guy in florida and had booked the earliest flight going out the next day. he knew i had class in the morning and wouldn't be able to take him then. his plan was just to have me drive him there late that night and camp out till his flight. 

a little after midnight edmond, myself and my friend jimmy left baton rouge for new orleans. the drive took us a little over an hour. we dropped edmond off at the terminal and jimmy jumped in the front with me. we left the airport around 1:30 am. since it was very late and a week night there were hardly any other cars on the highway.

we had been driving for 30 or 40 minutes, and had exited the spill way bridge. we were traveling through a very desolate part of i-10 and their were no other cars in sight. there was marsh to our left and thick woods to our right. it was very dark, no street lights on this stretch of road. i noticed a bright green light near the top of my driver side window. i initially thought the light was a reflection from something in the cars cabin, like a cell phone or a check engine light on my dashboard. i looked around my cabin compartment but nothing was different. i looked back out the window and the light was still there. i now realized that the light wasn't a reflection but rather an actual orb of green light flying at about a 60 degree angle next to my car. the light was bright and was a soft green color. it was about the size of a beach ball. i was going about 75 mph and the glowing orb was keeping up with me, sometimes going a little faster, sometimes a little slower. i could see the orb navigating the top of the tree line. going behind some trees and in front of others. i couldn't believe it. i yelled to jimmy to lay in my lap and look up. he could not see the object from the passenger seat since it was almost over the car. i actually grabbed the back of his neck and tried to push his head into my lap. jimmy was like "what the hell are you doing!". i gave up on jimmy and i was barely even watching the road at this point, my eyes were glued on the object. all of a sudden it turned left at about 75-80 degrees and shot off over the marsh at an easy 200 mph. it left a slight green tail as it shot away through the tree tops. i told jimmy what i had seen, he didn't really say anything to me about it. i think it scared him or maybe he didn't believe me. i did not feel scared though, i actually felt happy. i am not sure if the ship affected me in this way, but i was happy. the rest of the drive home was uneventful. 

i could draw this scene for you if you like.
content.summary: Bright green glowing orb intelligently navigating the tree tops as it followed my car.

content.detailedDescription: 5:50pm bright flash as if the craft was decending from a worm hole. after the flash the craft was a dark metal or black sphere about asprin sided. it moved very fast from horizon to horizon until out of sight. there were aircraft in the air which seemed to be at the same altitude ( 35,000-40,000) cruising altitude with cond trails. this craft was easily 2 to 3 times as fast. around 7:30 the same night i saw what i have seen before, a small star-like orb moving slowly in the north.My father (retired air force a-10 mechanic)saw it with me and immediately said this is no known aircraft.The first sighting startled me, i have neever seen anything like this before.
content.summary: Orb flashed very bright amber as if it descended from a worm hole. then moved very quickly across the sky from south west  to north

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down a road after leaving a meeting in rock tavern ny. at the end of the road at the stop sign 2 people who were also at the same meeting had stopped their cars and were standing in the road. they were both mesmerized by the thing in the sky. when i looked up, i was mesmerized too. holy ****! what is that!!!!! we all started yelling at each other over what we're looking at in disbelief. we were off of rt 207 up the street from toleman, the object was in the tree's hovering and it appeared to be over the mta refuge area. stewart airport gets a lot of aerial traffic, but this thing was just hovering, not on a schedule to get somewhere. it was shaped like a elongated egg next to a racquet ball next to a egg <0o0> where the ends slope down to a point with 3 interior compartments. it had a amber yellow glow to the outer aura, with a brighter yellow/whitish pulsating inner glow, each compartment appeared to have a black center to it. 3 of us watched this thing for a few minutes as it was above the tree's but from our vantage point it appeared to be in the trees. it was in a north north west  sky from us at 9:30ish at night. there were 2 aircraft both flying west and east of this object at much higher altitudes, their red and blue strobe lights identified them plain as day. this thing was pulsating yellow.  like dummies we changed our position to higher ground for a better look. by the time we got to the higher ground, mellow yellow was gone. none of us thought about using our phones or camera's to take a picture of it but it was cool to watch...
content.summary: Orange county ny 2011

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from a softball game one summer night in 2008, just outside of richmond va. a large triangular object with three lights, one at each point of the shape, shined bright white. it was very dark out and i couldn't believe no other cars noticed it, maybe they did. i drove along side it for about 15 minutes and it left my view on a slow path toward the direction i was headed toward. i merged onto i95 south and exited at my exit, just outside of colonial height va. it was a laps of ten minutes or so and i pulled up to the stop light i was astonished to see it directly in front of me. two convenience stores are at the intersection and where very active. it flew slowly, directly over my car and sped off behind me and up into the sky. my light turned green and i continued home and regret not stopping or catching it on my phone camera to this day. i only mentioned it jokingly to my husband, who paid me no mind. haven't really talked about it since. i have   always watched the skies and have never seen anything like it before or since, except on the internet. i have seen strange lights before, which move in strange patterns at fast speeds, from a distance but never something this concrete or close. as it flew over my car, the sheer size was astonishing,as big as a wal-mart. the center of the bottom of the craft had a yellow window/light of some sort with a fussy image in it. i felt like it could hear my thoughts and wanted to say, "o.K. here i am and goodbye for now." i know what i saw and i will never forget it. i didn't feel fear but peace and it confirmed for me, my beliefes of alien lifeforms moving about our planet.
content.summary: Driving south from iron bridge rd to colonial heights, size of football field, felt they could hear what i was thinking

content.detailedDescription: On halloween night, a big group of us were taking our children trick-or-treating and we observed lights, fairly low in the sky, coming over my rooftop from west to east. as the lights got over our heads, we heard the distinct sound of jet airplanes in formation. we observed these lights circling lees summit for approximately 45 minutes. the reason i'm writing you is because we've been watching some of the flap over this particular sighting, and while we've seen some weird stuff in the sky over lees summit in the past few months, this was undeniably a group of jets flying perfectly in formation.
content.summary: Observed lights over lees summit, mo

content.detailedDescription:
This is being submitted/investigated by jim s. (mufon fi id 12701)

approximately in 1982, i and three other acquaintances were fishing on my boat in the middle of portage lake, when we saw a large star-like object.  we joked that it could be a ufo and at that point, the ufo descended rapidly and hovered right over us.  it was so close, that i observed figures in the windows.  the next thing we knew is that we were standing on the beach with the boat on/near the shoreline.  since 1982, i have had an extremely strong sense or fear of ever saying anything about this incident to anyone.
content.summary: Ufo descended and hovered over our boat on portage lake

content.detailedDescription: It was my b-day july 13th 1977 and i invited guest for lasagne dinner.While i was cooking in the kitchen the evening, someone/one of the wilson children i think sheldon) told me to come out and look.  something about, could i tell them what this is? i went out looked to the right on summer street down hill, and a disklike object with no sound was coming upwards(we lived on a hill)headed straight up the street.  it's speed was possibly 25 to 30 mph the size of a baseball in distance.  as it neared it got larger and larger until we all were able to see directly under it. on it's sides were, i guess a ring of light panels that blinked symotaneously according to the speed of the craft. it hovered over our heads and went over the hill higher than the one we lived by the children of the neighborhoods school #7 headed north towards new york.  i say the craft's lights reacted tot he speed of the vehicle because of what happened on the news, shortly thereafter.  approxamately 7 or 8 pm(still light outside) on the news, kennedy air force base picked it up and had five or six jets now flanking the craft, and the panels were now a glowing ring of light.  instantly caught on camera, it shot straight up in the air, leaving the jets scrambling not to smash each other because of pursuit directions during the flank.  i thought abc channel 7 news of new york did an excellent job of reporting this.  needless to say, i have no longer worn an egotistic veil of ignorance about other beings here on this planet.  i have told my children and family that were there at the time that when the day comes for us to know it will be us that demand the truth.
content.summary: Happy b-day to me.  i knew we weren't the only intelligient life! 30 witnesses

content.detailedDescription: 1 in my yaard looking up at the sky. 2 its shape, size, and  motion. 3 ufo ! 4 saucer shape light-dark. stationary,slow moving,and traveling at high rate of speed. 5 had seen same before in oct. 2007. glad to see again. 6 departed earth for home plant on oct.21,2011.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saucer shaped craft, entity approched me and communcited in sign lanuage and english.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside on my pario near midnight.I saw a strange slow light coming across the sky toward our house (high above). as it got closer i realized it had boomberang shaped light on the front. as is slowly made its way above me i noticed the rest of the object was a dull dark greay sphere. it was quite large in size. it was headed in a straight line over the house.

i thought my heart stopped. i couldn't move, i was in awe.

i lost sight of the object after it passed over my home.
content.summary: Disc like object with boomerang shaped light on front. rest of the object was grey and dull.

content.detailedDescription: Star like object moving faster than a jet but slower than a meteor and under cloud cover appx 2000 agl. object moved from south west to east north east direction at high rate of speed until visual contact could was lost.
content.summary: Star like object moving faster than a jet but slower than a meteor and under cloud cover appx 2000 agl

content.detailedDescription:
Took the dog out, and my attention was caught by a flash above me.  two more meteor-type flashes happened after that, between orion and pleaides, but nearer to orion.  

just wanted to add this because of a report from georgia (2011/11/02)that reported something odd at 5:45am that morning.

familiar with "falling stars", i have not yet seen several fall from the same area at one time.  (probably just not outside enough!)
content.summary: Looked into crystal-clear sky at orion and pleiades after a peripheral flash of light caught my attention.  then saw 2 more, putting it down to meteorites.

content.detailedDescription:
As usual, i was sleeping at this time of the morning, just like anyone else would be in my neighborhood. but also in the norm of things, when they (aliens) choose for me to witness something that they are doing or something that is going to happen, they make sure i am there for it. at exactly 2am i awoke startled with anxiety over something that was about to happen. i proceeded to get dressed, grab some coffee and head out the door to sit on the front porch and wait and see what was the urgency of their call. at exactly 2:20am the horses in the field next door were spooked and ran furiously for the barn. at 2:28am flying downward at a 50-degree pitch was a brilliant green plasma ship with wave like motion of opal around and with tail that reach out over a hundred feet in length behind. the ship was in the shape of a huge manta-ray that seemed as though it were trying to use it's wings to slow down it's decent. when approximately sixty feet above the ground, it vanished as if it went interdimentional. the only sound was that of what could be heard by the animals. and all this happened within approximately 4 minutes.
the only feelings left behind were the same as they always are, the longing for home, wishing they would finally set my mind at ease. so many years of constant communication and yet no real commitment. feelings of being used.

over the past year or ever since that last ship i spotted approximately a half mile from my home, my health continued to get worse. the ship in mention, was the ship that beamed a light that shown from my head to my toes, feeling as if i were being scanned. every joint, bone and muscle in my body ached for weeks. within the past year, i gained over a hundred pounds in water and the doctors cannot figure out why. now only recently, it is going in reverse, since the last ufo spotting mentioned above.

also, about a week or so ago, i woke one morning to find something very shocking, something that had never happened before, that i can remember. my ankles were black-n-blue as if i had been tightly shackled. this went away within hours but, happened again a few days later and was noticed by a roommate.
content.summary: Plasma ship crash landing

content.detailedDescription: At aapprox. 3am iwas boarding my boat as soon as stepped 1 foot aboard somthing caught myeye to my rt.I looked and ther was octagon shapped disc hovering and bouncing like adragonfly for about three to five seconds  it shot up the intercoastal water way towards wilmington n.C.As soon asit did that another one showed up in the exact same spot same movement everything. iwatched this for i believedto be the same amount of time the object took off did two giant looptoloop and shot offin two space with one that went up river streaking across sky into space also. now how did i get close enough to it to see that it had tarnish marks and peeble sized dingsalso i never moved but i could see myself standing on the dock looking up to my right icame down and circled back into my body on my left side. there are few more details but i would rather talk to someone on phone or in person.Alsothis thing looked anceint not modern at all the craft itself almost looked alive in the way that it moved.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.summary: Octagon in shape very biblical lookinghad pings in exterior with green tarnish marks hoverd like adragonfly

content.detailedDescription: I live south of the golden gate bridge. about 11:45pm on 10/02/2011 i was looking out my window facing north to north-east at a planet(?) or star which was somewhat dim due to background light. i then saw an extremely bright white object 'falling' from the sky about the same size as the star from my vantage point. i say falling because it almost tumbled like a leaf in a semi-zigzag pattern. was extremely bright and moving very, very fast. this didn't look like a shooting star but i'm not ruling it out. could have been 'space junk' or something burning up from entering the atmosphere. seemed to be right over the gg bridge or near it over sf bay. was not an airplane. i see planes often over the bay and this object was not a plane. anyone else see that?
content.summary: Unidentified falling object

content.detailedDescription: My brother, boyfriend and i were sitting by our campfire tonight...Approx. 6:30 - 7:00 tonight.  first witness saw the light first coming over our neighbors trees just to the north...We were all observing at first through the tree limbs, could have given the effect that the object was wobbling.  at first it seemed to be heading our direction, then made a noticable  change direction towards the south...As i saw it clearly between the limbs. it seemed to change speed, speed up then slow down...Kind of wobbly like, my brother and i walked around the other side of the house into the clearing, when all of a sudden, the light changed from a bright white star like glow...(appeared that way to me as i didn't have my glasses on), it suddenly changed color to a deep reddish orange...Then it just dissapeared! right afterward a really loud jet flew overhead crossing over the area where the object dissappeared. at first we thought it might have been a drone, the only thing was that there was absolutely no sound...Hard to explain what it could be.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright star like object observed 3 witnesses

content.detailedDescription: Me and my children saw some strange lights while looking out the door. so we grabbed my camera and got in my car and followed it. the noise in the back ground is gravel road. the objects were not flying like any aircraft we have ever seen and the objects were lowere than aircraft. we followed them until we couldn't see them anymore.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Me and my kids saw strange lights in the sky and got in my car and followed them and video

content.detailedDescription:
We were in the pool.  one guy said look and pointed south.  we all watched as a solid chevron shaped flying object flw silently almost directly over our head snd continued northbound till out of sight.  we thought at first it was a flock of geese but it had no sound and no movement it was solid.  someonw said it looked like a glider but it was dark out. someone tho0ught it might be a drone from the 29 palms air base but again it had no lights and was completely silent.

we were pretty confused  .. noone could come up with a plausible explaination for what we had witnessed.  we decided it was definately unidentified..But dont know much other than that.
content.summary: South to north silent pretty low and very big reflected light only

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside of my back door and thought i was taking a picture of a jet that didn't look to be moving. it was about a year later when i was going over my photos and i zoomed in on what i was taking a picture of. it is obviously not a jet or weather balloon. the last photo looks like there is a plume like they both took off at a very high speed. if you can tell me what you think this is, i would very much appriciate it.
content.summary: I was taking a photo of the sky and i thought i was taking a picture of a jet that was just sitting there. i didn't notice what i was taking a picture of until about a year later when i was going over my photos. i zoomed in on it and said

content.detailedDescription:
Submitted and being investigated by mufon fi, jim strausbaugh

it was north of bellcenter in ohio and south of kenton ohio. moving nne above the tree tops, no sound and no lights just a soft slow movement over the trees till out of sight, and i watched it for 12 to 18 seconds of flight.  it was the size of a bus and it changed my life,, i was standing up hill looking down in the field an seen my dog  look at something and i looked as well.  my dog seen it first , think about that for a second  and then followed through with the flight as i did till out of sight over the trees,  no sound, no lights, and i was the last person on earth to beleave in ufo`s and now i don`t beleave anything that our government has to say from that day on.
content.summary: Observed a bus-sized ufo slowly moving 30ft above ground
